amendment.description: To leverage commercial satellite remote sensing.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2138 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2138 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Cruz to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4192) To leverage commercial satellite remote sensing.
